com.isti.traceview.data
Class Segment

java.lang.Object
  com.isti.traceview.data.Segment
All Implemented Interfaces:
Externalizable, Serializable, Cloneable
public class Segment
extends Object
implements Externalizable, Cloneable

Represent continuous set of raw trace data without gaps belongs to same data source. A Seismic trace therefore is defined as a sorted (by time) list of segments.

Author:
Max Kokoulin
See Also:

Constructor Detail

Segment

public Segment(ISource dataSource,
               long startOffset,
               Date startTime,
               double sampleRate,
               int sampleCount,
               int RDPserialNumber)
Parameters:
dataSource - data source containing this segment
startOffset - segment starting offset in data source
startTime - segment data start time
sampleRate - segment data sample rate
sampleCount - count of samples in the segment
RDPserialNumber - ordinal number of segment in the data source

setGapTolerance

public static void setGapTolerance(double tolerance)
Sets gap tolerance to detect gaps between segments. 1.0 is a gap of 2*sample rate

Parameters:
